seedGroups.name: Elaiosomes
seedGroups.description: Elaiosomes are “ant candy” attached to the seeds. Ants are strong and motivated, able to quickly carry the candy back to their home and tossing the heavy “candy wrapper” (seeds) into their compost piles.

species.description: Elaiosomes. The spade-shaped leaves make a lovely native groundcover. Burgundy flowers are hidden under the leaves, right on top of the soil. Capsules degrade into a mealy mess; collect when soft & mushy. Plants also divide & transplant easily.
